thread.title: Verizon’s Go90 Video Service Targets Millennials
thread.title_full: Verizon’s Go90 Video Service Targets Millennials - WSJ

author: Ryan Knutson
title: Verizon’s Go90 Video Service Targets Millennials
text:
As Verizon Communications Inc. was working to close a $130 billion deal to take full control of Verizon Wireless, it was another, much smaller acquisition that CEO Lowell McAdam was saying privately would be revolutionary.
Soon, his prediction will be put to the test.
The deal Mr. McAdam spoke of was his purchase of OnCue, a unit inside... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
